New Records: India maintained their record of remaining unbeaten against Afghanistan in T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 53 off 28 balls, while Hardik Pandya hit 32 off 24 deliveries
Rashid Khan and Fazalhaq Farooqi took three wickets each for Afghanistan
Arshdeep Singh and Jasprit Bumrah picked three wickets each for India
Kuldeep Yadav took two wickets for India
Axar Patel and Ravindra Jadeja also clinched one wicket each for India
Pre-Game Insights: Rashid Khan said that Afghanistan would have liked to bat first, but India won the toss and decided to bat first
Rohit Sharma said that India is looking to adapt to the conditions quickly and play their natural game
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav received the player of the match award for his superb innings
India maintained their record of remaining unbeaten against Afghanistan in T20 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The probability of precipitation in Barbados was only 3% for the match
The pitch was expected to be more batting-friendly in Barbados compared to the challenging pitches in New York
